definitions: a set of criteria or stated values in relation to which measurements or judgments can be made

examples.text: the observer interprets what he sees in terms of his own cultural frame of reference

shortDefinitions: set of criteria or stated values in relation to which measurements or judgements can be made

definitions: a system of geometric axes in relation to which measurements of size, position, or motion can be made.
shortDefinitions: system of geometric axes in relation to which measurements of size, position, or motion can be made
